titleStmt.title: The fancies, chast and noble presented by the Queenes Maiesties Servants, at the Phoenix in Drury-lane.
titleStmt.author: Ford, John, 1586-ca. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[lizabeth] P[urslowe] for Henry Seile, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Tygers Head in Fleetstreet, over-against Saint Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the Tygers Head in Fleetstreet, over-against Saint Dunstans Church
